mapper.insert: INSERT INTO semaphores (name, checksum, created_at, updated_at, locked_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{checksum}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp, #{lockedAt})
mapper.select: select s.id, s.name as name, s.locked_at as lockedAt, s.created_at as createdAt, s.updated_at as updatedAt from semaphores s where s.name=#{name}
